newsitem.title: GREECE: ATHLETICS-PROFILE OF WORLD MEN'S MARATHON CHAMPION ANTON.
newsitem.headline: ATHLETICS-PROFILE OF WORLD MEN'S MARATHON CHAMPION ANTON.

text.p: Profile of Abel Anton, who won the world men's marathon title on Sunday.
The 10,000 metres European champion, Anton had a long career on the track before making a brilliant marathon debut with a win in Berlin last year.
Won the 10,000 metres at the 1987 European Cup in his first year at the event. Took silver over 3,000 metres at the European indoor championships in 1989.
Has run the 10,000 in three world championships -- 1987, 1991 and 1993 -- reaching the final every time.
